game.name: Chef RPG
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Craft your culinary adventure in a beautiful pixel art world. Manage your restaurants, forage and hunt for ingredients, befriend locals, and grow your culinary empire. What kind of chef will you be?
game.shortDescriptionEn: Craft your culinary adventure in a beautiful pixel art world. Manage your restaurants, forage and hunt for ingredients, befriend locals, and grow your culinary empire. What kind of chef will you be?

reviewHighlights.text: 재밌는데 하다가 이벤트 스킵해버렸는데 되돌아가는 방법이 없어서 ㅠㅠ 처음부터 다시하려고요.. 슬프다..
